tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
quoteText: If any part of these Terms of Service is held invalid or unenforceable, that part will be construed to reflect the drafterâ€™s original intent, and the remaining portions will remain in full force and effect.
